parameters.name: color
parameters.description:
Colour of the waveform.
          Quick examples:
            * `green` - deep green, brightness untouched
            * `blue brightness:100%` - deep blue, maximum brightness
            * `hsb:0,1,1` - deep red, maximum brightness
            * `random` - random hue, maximum saturation, brightness untouched
            * `kelvin:2700` - warm white, brightness untouched
            * `saturation:100%` - set maximum saturation

parameters.name: from_color
parameters.description:
From colour of the waveform.
          Quick examples:
            * `green` - deep green, brightness untouched
            * `blue brightness:100%` - deep blue, maximum brightness
            * `hsb:0,1,1` - deep red, maximum brightness
            * `random` - random hue, maximum saturation, brightness untouched
            * `kelvin:2700` - warm white, brightness untouched
            * `saturation:100%` - set maximum saturation

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period of the waveform in seconds. Defaults to 1.0

parameters.name: cycles
parameters.description: Amount of cycles to repeat waveform. Defaults to 1

parameters.name: persist
parameters.description: If true, light(s) will keep its state at the end of the effect. Defaults to false

parameters.name: power_on
parameters.description: Turns the light on. Defaults to true

parameters.name: peak
parameters.description: Defines where in a `period` the target colour is at its maximum. Range: 0â€“1
